senses.sense_definition: Describing a condition, exposure, or effect that persists or repeats over a relatively short or intermediate period, typically falling between acute and chronic stages.

examples.text: The scientists initiated a <w>subchronic</w> study to observe the effects of the medication over a ninety-day period.
Repeated <w>subchronic</w> exposure to the chemical caused mild irritation that resolved once the contact ceased.
